text: Arvière-en-Valromey is a new commune in the Ain department of eastern France. It was founded on 1 January 2019. It is made up of the former communes of Brénaz, Chavornay, Lochieu and Virieu-le-Petit.Arrêté préfectoral , 17 December 2018 == References == Category:2019 establishments in France Category:Communes in Ain
title: Arvière-en-Valromey
